recipes.Label: Craft: Labhitic Tincture
recipes.StartDescription: Focus my own and local resources to create a small quantity of a stable Edge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I crush a suitable Leaf into to the brew, it'll make a dangerous ink.)
recipes.Desc: As it clarifies, the Tincture vibrates judderingly. The technical term for this is 'growling'.

recipes.Label: Craft: Labhitic Tincture
recipes.StartDescription: Focus my own and local resources to create a small quantity of a stable Edge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add something with a Memory aspect, and I have the makings of a significant Edge Memory.)
recipes.Desc: As it clarifies, the Tincture vibrates judderingly. This is called 'growling'.

recipes.Label: Craft: Labhitic Tincture
recipes.StartDescription: Focus my own and local resources to create a small quantity of a stable Edge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add something with a Memory aspect, and I have the makings of a significant Edge Memory.)
recipes.Desc: As it clarifies, the Tincture vibrates judderingly. This is called 'growling'.

recipes.Label: Craft: Labhitic Tincture
recipes.StartDescription: Focus my own and local resources to create a small quantity of a stable Edge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: this much Edge and something with the Leaf aspect will brew me a dangerous ink.)
recipes.Desc: As it clarifies, the Tincture vibrates judderingly. This is called 'growling'.

recipes.Label: Craft: Midnight Mark
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate nocturnal resonances with a careful sigil. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this on Remains, I can render something darkly leathery and chillingly powerful.)
recipes.Desc: The Mark shouldn't be exposed to sunlight, but that's mostly because it looks surprisingly ugly in sunlight.

recipes.Label: Craft: Torgue's Cleansing
recipes.StartDescription: Purge myself of harmonious resonances, accruing some personal Edge. It won't be pleasant. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: this much Edge and something with the Leaf aspect will brew me a dangerous ink.)
recipes.Desc: The Cleansing has left my skin burning, my teeth throbbing. The Corrivality rumbles beneath the membraneous surfaces of the waking world.

recipes.Label: Craft: Torgue's Cleansing
recipes.StartDescription: Purge myself of harmonious resonances, accruing some personal Edge. It won't be pleasant. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add something with a Memory aspect, and I have the makings of a significant Edge Memory.)
recipes.Desc: The Cleansing has left my skin burning, my teeth throbbing. The Corrivality rumbles beneath the membraneous surfaces of the waking world.

recipes.Label: Craft: Torgue's Cleansing
recipes.StartDescription: Purge myself of harmonious resonances, accruing some personal Edge. It won't be pleasant. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add something with a Memory aspect, and I have the makings of a significant Edge Memory.)
recipes.Desc: The Cleansing has left my skin burning, my teeth throbbing. The Corrivality rumbles beneath the membraneous surfaces of the waking world.

recipes.Label: Craft: Torgue's Cleansing
recipes.StartDescription: Purge myself of harmonious resonances, accruing some personal Edge. It won't be pleasant. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add something with a Memory aspect, and I have the makings of a significant Edge Memory.)
recipes.Desc: The Cleansing has left my skin burning, my teeth throbbing. The Corrivality rumbles beneath the membraneous surfaces of the waking world.

recipes.Label: Craft: Torgue's Cleansing
recipes.StartDescription: Purge myself of earthly influences, accruing some personal Edge through the savagery of the process. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use an Instrument, I can use the experience as an inspiration for Sky-focused music.)
recipes.Desc: The Cleansing has left my eyes dazzled, my skin burning. The Corrivality manifests even in the operations of the Sun.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bitterblack Salts
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate smouldering essences into a Forge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Metal to this much Forge, I could alloy it into something exotic.)
recipes.Desc: One can cook with Bitterblack Salts, but only if one uses them very sparingly.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bitterblack Salts
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate smouldering essences into a Forge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe:  if I add Liquid, but retain this much Forge, the essences will take longer to cool, and redden into something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: One can cook with Bitterblack Salts, but only if one uses them very sparingly.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bitterblack Salts
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate smouldering essences into a Forge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Metal to this much Forge, I could alloy it into something exotic.)
recipes.Desc: One can cook with Bitterblack Salts, but only if one uses them very sparingly.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bitterblack Salts
recipes.StartDescription: An old mason's trick: concentrate smouldering essences into a Forge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Metal to this much Forge, I could alloy it into something exotic.)
recipes.Desc: Bitterblack Salts were used in mortar once, but they have many other purposes.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bitterblack Salts
recipes.StartDescription: Something from the boundaries of the jeweller's art: concentrate smouldering essences into a Forge ingredient. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe:  if I add Liquid, but retain this much Forge, the essences will take longer to cool, and redden into something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: Bitterblack Salts have been used as an ingredient in jeweller's polish, but they have many other purposes.

recipes.Label: Craft: Westcott's Compounds
recipes.StartDescription: The Ordo Limiae taught how to prepare Forgeful compounds from ephemeral materials - 'the Moth finds the Flame'. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe:  if I include a Memory and smoke the preparation while it's fresh, I'll gain a riddlesome insight.)
recipes.Desc: The common name now is 'Westcott's Compounds', but the Ordo Limiae is older than Westcott by… quite some centuries. Probably. Westcott wasn't Long as far as anyone ever knew.

recipes.Label: Craft: Westcott's Compounds
recipes.StartDescription: An alchemical trick for rendering the ephemeral into volatile compounds - 'the Moth finds the Flame'. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe:  if I include a Memory and smoke the preparation while it's fresh, I'll gain a riddlesome insight.)
recipes.Desc: Westcott probably didn't invent all these, but he knew how to make a name stick.

recipes.Label: Craft: Westcott's Compounds
recipes.StartDescription: Sort, mix, concentrate: an odd set of compounds with a variety of uses. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe:  if I add Liquid, but retain this much Forge, the essences will take longer to cool, and redden into something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: Westcott probably didn't invent all these, but he knew how to make a name stick.

recipes.Label: Craft: Westcott's Compounds
recipes.StartDescription: The Reflections include alchemical techniques. I can use those to prepare an odd set of compounds with a variety of uses. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe:  if I add Liquid, but retain this much Forge, the essences will take longer to cool, and redden into something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: Westcott probably didn't invent all these, but he knew how to make a name stick.

recipes.Label: Craft: Westcott's Compounds
recipes.StartDescription: Sort, mix, concentrate: an odd set of compounds with a variety of uses. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe:  if I add Liquid, but retain this much Forge, the essences will take longer to cool, and redden into something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: Westcott probably didn't invent all these, but he knew how to make a name stick.

recipes.Label: Craft: Beguiling Melody
recipes.StartDescription: Conceive or recall a delightful little music. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I hum that music to a mixture which includes a Flower, it'll give the mixture an intoxicating quality.)
recipes.Desc: I'll be humming this for a while. And so will anyone else who happens by.

recipes.Label: Craft: Beguiling Melody
recipes.StartDescription: Conceive or recall a delightful little music. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Fabric, I can hum the faintest life into a little cloth doll.)
recipes.Desc: I'll be humming this for a while. And so will anyone else who happens by.

recipes.Label: Craft: Beguiling Melody
recipes.StartDescription: Recall a delightful little music from a different time... (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Fabric, I can hum the faintest life into a little cloth doll.)
recipes.Desc: I'll be humming this for a while. And so will anyone else who happens by.

recipes.Label: Craft: Beguiling Melody
recipes.StartDescription: Stitch together phrases of sacred music to make something delightful. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Fabric, I can hum the faintest life into a little cloth doll.)
recipes.Desc: I'll be humming this for a while. And so will anyone else who happens by.

recipes.Label: Craft: Witching Tisane
recipes.StartDescription: The odd petal and the occasional stem, dried to brew a tisane. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a Flower, the mixture will become intoxicating.)
recipes.Desc: It's best when it's warm; but it'll keep.

recipes.Label: Craft: Witching Tisane
recipes.StartDescription: The odd leaf and the occasional berry, dried to brew a tisane. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a Flower, the mixture will become intoxicating.)
recipes.Desc: It's best when it's warm; but it'll keep.

recipes.Label: Craft: Witching Tisane
recipes.StartDescription: Hush House still rings with thwarted desires. I'll mix that into a tisane. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a Flower, the mixture will become intoxicating.)
recipes.Desc: It's best when it's warm; but it'll keep.

recipes.Label: Craft: Witching Tisane
recipes.StartDescription: Daub the vessel with suitable signs, and the tisane within will take on a particular potency. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I soak Fabric in the brew, I can twist it into a Grailful little cloth doll.)
recipes.Desc: It's best when it's warm; but it'll keep.

recipes.Label: Craft: Witching Tisane
recipes.StartDescription: Here where the sea sounds, I can mix a tide-touched tisane. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I soak Fabric in the brew, I can twist it into a Grailful little cloth doll.)
recipes.Desc: It's best when it's warm; but it'll keep.

recipes.Label: Craft: Cheerful Ditty
recipes.StartDescription: Conceive or recall a rousing, catchy tune. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I work at an Instrument, I can elevate it to something more powerful.)
recipes.Desc: Tiddly tiddly tum ti diddle. Tum!

recipes.Label: Craft: Cheerful Ditty
recipes.StartDescription: Conceive or recall a rousing, catchy tune. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I work at an Instrument, I can elevate it to something more powerful.)
recipes.Desc: Pom ti pom ti pom. Padom!

recipes.Label: Craft: Perhibiate
recipes.StartDescription: Not all bindings are physical. I can brew an ink of links. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Fabric, I can stain the fibres with the binding brew and stitch something of greater power.)
recipes.Desc: Some authorities claim it's difficult to lose a pot of perhibiate ink, but they haven't lived at Hush House.

recipes.Label: Craft: Perhibiate
recipes.StartDescription: Not all knots are physical. I can brew an ink which ties the naming to the named. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Fabric, I can weave the stained fibres into a greater binding.)
recipes.Desc: Some authorities claim it's difficult to lose a pot of perhibiate ink, but they haven't lived at Hush House.

recipes.Label: Craft: Perhibiate
recipes.StartDescription: I can brew a minor Ink of Power: a binding ink. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I crush in a suitable Leaf, I can make this a deadlier and more potent Ink.)
recipes.Desc: Some authorities claim it's difficult to lose a pot of perhibiate ink, but they haven't lived at Hush House.

recipes.Label: Craft: Regensburg Balm
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a herbal palliative. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a suitably aspected Liquid, I'll brew something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: Medicine should smell like this: reassuringly offputting.

recipes.Label: Craft: Regensburg Balm
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a calming cure. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a suitably aspected Liquid, I'll brew something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: Medicine should smell like this: reassuringly offputting.

recipes.Label: Craft: Regensburg Balm
recipes.StartDescription: Mix a simple cure. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a suitably aspected Liquid, I'll brew something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: Medicine should smell like this: reassuringly offputting.

recipes.Label: Craft: Regensburg Balm
recipes.StartDescription: Mix something to keep disease at bay. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a suitably aspected Liquid, I'll brew something more potent.)
recipes.Desc: Medicine should smell like this: reassuringly offputting.

recipes.Label: Craft: Regensburg Balm
recipes.StartDescription: Mix something to keep disease at bay. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a suitably aspected Liquid, I'll brew something touched with the power of the Thunderskin.)
recipes.Desc: Medicine should smell like this: reassuringly offputting.

recipes.Label: Craft: Secret Threshold
recipes.StartDescription: Call on the lesser names of the Chancel to hallow a new threshold. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I'll brew a powerful Knock toxin.)
recipes.Desc: An opening-opportunity that'll last a little while.

recipes.Label: Craft: Secret Threshold
recipes.StartDescription: Employ the doorkeeper's lesser-known Arts to establish a new threshold. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I'll brew a powerful Knock toxin.)
recipes.Desc: An opening-opportunity that'll last a little while.

recipes.Label: Craft: Secret Threshold
recipes.StartDescription: Call on the power of the lower Mansus-gates to establish a new threshold. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with an Egg, I'll hatch something eyeless, but pulsing with potential.)
recipes.Desc: An opening-opportunity that'll last a little while.

recipes.Label: Craft: Secret Threshold
recipes.StartDescription: Employ a complex round of rhymes to establish a new threshold. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a Memory, it'll resolve to a Knock-insight.)
recipes.Desc: An opening-opportunity that'll last a little while.

recipes.Label: Craft: Amethyst Ampoule
recipes.StartDescription: Shape, tint, fill a paradoxical Knock-ampoule. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a Metal, I'll create an exotic alloy.)
recipes.Desc: It has its uses, but none of them are simple and few are safe.

recipes.Label: Craft: Amethyst Ampoule
recipes.StartDescription: Create an unusual and dangerous medicine: a paradoxical Knock-ampoule. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I'll brew a powerful Knock toxin.)
recipes.Desc: It has its uses, but none of them are simple and few are safe.

recipes.Label: Craft: Amethyst Ampoule
recipes.StartDescription: Shape and fill a paradoxical Knock-ampoule. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I'll brew a powerful Knock toxin.)
recipes.Desc: It has its uses, but none of them are simple and few are safe.

recipes.Label: Craft: Amethyst Ampoule
recipes.StartDescription: Blend acids for a paradoxical Knock-ampoule. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Glass, I'll create a Knock-alloy of interest to the most ambitious clockmakers.)
recipes.Desc: It has its uses, but none of them are simple and few are safe.

recipes.Label: Craft: Amethyst Ampoule
recipes.StartDescription: Draw glyphs to empower a paradoxical Knock-ampoule. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a Memory, I can inhale the jewel-colours and gain a more powerful Knock-insight.)
recipes.Desc: It has its uses, but none of them are simple and few are safe.

recipes.Label: Craft: Refulgin
recipes.StartDescription: Mix a pigment of blinding white. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I can distil a more potent alchemical essence.)
recipes.Desc: Glow, little colour.

recipes.Label: Craft: Refulgin
recipes.StartDescription: Mix a pigment of blinding white. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I can distil a more potent alchemical essence.)
recipes.Desc: Glow, little colour.

recipes.Label: Craft: Refulgin
recipes.StartDescription: Mix a pigment of blinding white, one that the Church used for their rites before the Dissolution. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Glass, I can resolve it into a more potent Lantern-liquid, a sacred substance.)
recipes.Desc: Glow, little colour.

recipes.Label: Craft: Refulgin
recipes.StartDescription: Mix a pigment of blinding white, one that the Church used for their rites before the Dissolution. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Glass, I can resolve it into a more potent Lantern-liquid, a precursor of the ink Ashartine.)
recipes.Desc: Glow, little colour.

recipes.Label: Craft: Dearday Lens
recipes.StartDescription: Craft an optical device. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Glass, I can distil a more potent Lantern-liquid.)
recipes.Desc: The Lens is asymmetrical - fragile - unstable. That's what gives it power.

recipes.Label: Craft: Dearday Lens
recipes.StartDescription: Craft an optical device. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Glass, I can distil a more potent Lantern-liquid.)
recipes.Desc: The Lens is asymmetrical - fragile - unstable. That's what gives it power.

recipes.Label: Craft: Dearday Lens
recipes.StartDescription: Forge an optical device. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I can distil a more potent Lantern-essence.)
recipes.Desc: The Lens is asymmetrical - fragile - unstable. That's what gives it power.

recipes.Label: Craft: Dearday Lens
recipes.StartDescription: Grind an optical device. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Memory, I'll glean a powerful insight with some Lantern and more Scale.)
recipes.Desc: The Lens is asymmetrical - fragile - unstable. That's what gives it power.

recipes.Label: Craft: Midnight Mark
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate nocturnal resonances with a careful sigil. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I trace the mark on Wood, it'll burst into strange fruit.)
recipes.Desc: The Mark shouldn't be exposed to sunlight, but that's mostly because it looks surprisingly ugly in sunlight.

recipes.Label: Craft: Midnight Mark
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate nocturnal resonances with a careful sigil. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with an Egg, I'll hatch something mischievous and silvery.)
recipes.Desc: The Mark shouldn't be exposed to sunlight, but that's mostly because it looks surprisingly ugly in sunlight.

recipes.Label: Craft: Midnight Mark
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate nocturnal resonances with a careful sigil. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with an Egg, I'll hatch something mischievous and silvery.)
recipes.Desc: The Mark shouldn't be exposed to sunlight, but that's mostly because it looks surprisingly ugly in sunlight.

recipes.Label: Craft: Midnight Mark
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate nocturnal resonances with a careful sigil. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with an Egg, I'll hatch something eyeless, but pulsing with potential.)
recipes.Desc: The Mark shouldn't be exposed to sunlight, but that's mostly because it looks surprisingly ugly in sunlight.

recipes.Label: Craft: Midnight Mark
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate nocturnal resonances with a careful sigil. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this on Remains, I can render something darkly leathery and chillingly powerful.)
recipes.Desc: The Mark shouldn't be exposed to sunlight, but that's mostly because it looks surprisingly ugly in sunlight.

recipes.Label: Craft: Midnight Mark
recipes.StartDescription: Concentrate nocturnal resonances with a careful sigil. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add an Egg to the soak, I'll hatch something mischievous and silvery.)
recipes.Desc: The Mark shouldn't be exposed to sunlight, but that's mostly because it looks surprisingly ugly in sunlight.

recipes.Label: Craft: Catwink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a minor Ink with a virtue against vermin. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with a Beverage, I'll mix a dark liquor that is also a precursor to a Great Ink.)
recipes.Desc: Dark and pungent.

recipes.Label: Craft: Catwink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew an ink that will keep beetles at bay. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this on Remains, I can render something darkly leathery and chillingly powerful.)
recipes.Desc: Dark and pungent.

recipes.Label: Craft: Catwink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew an ink that will rouse regret in rats. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add an Egg to the soak, I'll hatch something mischievous and silvery.)
recipes.Desc: Dark and pungent.

recipes.Label: Craft: Catwink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew an ink that will suppress silverfish. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I'll brew a more subtle and more potent ink.)
recipes.Desc: Dark and pungent.

recipes.Label: Craft: Catwink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew an ink that will ward off worms… although only the least of their kind. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: mix in a Flower ingredient for a chillier outcome.)
recipes.Desc: Dark and pungent.

recipes.Label: Craft: Paint: Moth-Gold
recipes.StartDescription: Mix paint of a wistful golden hue. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Liquid, I'll brew a silvery moon-ink.)
recipes.Desc: Neither bright nor dark.

recipes.Label: Craft: Tanglebrag
recipes.StartDescription: Craft a token to invite the attention of a Moth-name. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I work with Memory I'll remember a riddle instead.)
recipes.Desc: Set it down softly, or it might roll away, even uphill.

recipes.Label: Craft: Tanglebrag
recipes.StartDescription: Craft a token to invite the attention of a Moth-name. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I nestle an Egg into the knot, I'll hatch something eyeless, but pulsing with potential.)
recipes.Desc: Set it down softly, or it might roll away, even uphill.

recipes.Label: Craft: Tanglebrag
recipes.StartDescription: Align shadows to invite the attention of a Moth-name. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: align the shadows through Glass, and gather a Lantern-liquid.)
recipes.Desc: Set it down softly, or it might roll away, even uphill.

recipes.Label: Craft: Tanglebrag
recipes.StartDescription: Tie a token to invite the attention of a Moth-name. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I work with Memory I'll remember a riddle instead.)
recipes.Desc: Set it down softly, or it might roll away, even uphill.

recipes.Label: Craft: Tanglebrag
recipes.StartDescription: Weave a token to invite the attention of a Moth-name. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I work with Memory I'll remember a riddle instead.)
recipes.Desc: Set it down softly, or it might roll away, even uphill.

recipes.Label: Craft: Thirza's Cordials
recipes.StartDescription: Brew an aromatic miscellany of cordials. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with a Beverage, I'll mix a darker, stronger liquor.)
recipes.Desc: Taste with care.

recipes.Label: Craft: Thirza's Cordials
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a pungent miscellany of cordials. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I steep Wood in the right proportions of the mixture, it'll burst into strange fruit.)
recipes.Desc: Taste with care.

recipes.Label: Craft: Thirza's Cordials
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a spicy miscellany of cordials. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I steep Wood in the right proportions of the mixture, it'll burst into strange fruit.)
recipes.Desc: Taste with care.

recipes.Label: Craft: Thirza's Cordials
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a musky miscellany of cordials. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with a Beverage, I'll mix a darker, stronger liquor.)
recipes.Desc: Taste with care.

recipes.Label: Craft: Thirza's Cordials
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a gritty, grainy miscellany of cordials. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe : if I add another Liquid, I might reproduce the proportions of a very old Sacrament - perhaps the oldest.)
recipes.Desc: Taste with care.

recipes.Label: Craft: Yewgall Ink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a dark and persistent ink. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with a Beverage, I'll mix a darker, stronger liquor.)
recipes.Desc: Don't spill it.

recipes.Label: Craft: Yewgall Ink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a dark and persistent ink. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use this with a Beverage, I'll mix a darker, stronger liquor.)
recipes.Desc: Don't spill it.

recipes.Label: Craft: Yewgall Ink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a dark and persistent ink. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I steep Wood in the right proportions of the mixture, it'll burst into strange fruit.)
recipes.Desc: Don't spill it.

recipes.Label: Craft: Yewgall Ink
recipes.StartDescription: Brew a dark and persistent ink. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I crush in a Leaf, I'll brew a more potent, and much more dangerous, ink.)
recipes.Desc: Don't spill it.

recipes.Label: Craft: Confounding Parable
recipes.StartDescription: Meditate on the space between sounds to recall a subtle memory. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I bring in another Memory, I can conceive a higher insight.)
recipes.Desc: It fits fairly tidily in the mind, as long as you turn it sideways.

recipes.Label: Craft: Confounding Parable
recipes.StartDescription: Let the wind-sounds gradually recall a subtle memory. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I bring in another Memory, I can conceive a higher insight.)
recipes.Desc: It fits fairly tidily in the mind, as long as you turn it sideways.

recipes.Label: Craft: Confounding Parable
recipes.StartDescription: Employ the Sisterhood's invocations to bring a subtle memory to mind. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I pronounce these invocations over an Egg, it'll hatch into something silvery and mischievous.)
recipes.Desc: It fits fairly tidily in the mind, as long as you turn it sideways.

recipes.Label: Craft: Confounding Parable
recipes.StartDescription: Muse on tradition, recall contradiction. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I use an Instrument, I can set this contradiction to music.)
recipes.Desc: It fits fairly tidily in the mind, as long as you turn it sideways.

recipes.Label: Craft: Confounding Parable
recipes.StartDescription: Remember the parables of the old teachings. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add Wood, I can use this insight to enchant an instrument.)
recipes.Desc: It fits fairly tidily in the mind, as long as you turn it sideways.

recipes.Label: Craft: Salt-Sign
recipes.StartDescription: Use salt to trace a sigil of night-travel and sunset-sound. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a Memory, I can achieve an insight more powerful than this Sign.)
recipes.Desc: Elegant as a flower-petal.

recipes.Label: Craft: Salt-Sign
recipes.StartDescription: Use salt to trace a sigil of wave-song and night-travel. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I hallow a Liquid with this sign, it will clarify into an Ink of Revelation.)
recipes.Desc: Elegant as a wave.

recipes.Label: Craft: Salt-Sign
recipes.StartDescription: Use salt to trace a sigil of journeys and returns. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I add a Memory, I can achieve an insight more powerful than this Sign.)
recipes.Desc: Elegant as a footprint.

recipes.Label: Craft: Salt-Sign
recipes.StartDescription: Use salt to trace a secret sigil of desert thresholds. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I trace the sign with a Light, I can wring a rosy essence from the air.)
recipes.Desc: Elegant as sunset.

recipes.Label: Craft: Salt-Sign
recipes.StartDescription: Use a rudimentary ink to trace a sigil of sense and sunset. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I trace the sign with a Light, I can wring a rosy essence from the air.)
recipes.Desc: Elegant as an alchemical formula.

recipes.Label: Craft: Salt-Sign
recipes.StartDescription: Use mud to trace a sigil of the silvered night. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: if I trace the sign on an Egg, I can hatch something eyeless, but pulsing with potential.)
recipes.Desc: Elegant as a smoothed pebbel.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bisclavret's Knot
recipes.StartDescription: Use earth to trace a sigil of the Hill-Children. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add a Memory to recall something older and more powerful.)
recipes.Desc: A difficult tangle of lines.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bisclavret's Knot
recipes.StartDescription: Use my own tears to trace a sigil of regret. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: mix a Liquid with my hallowed tears, to clarify it into a Knock-toxin.)
recipes.Desc: A difficult tangle of lines.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bisclavret's Knot
recipes.StartDescription: Use my own blood to trace a feral sigil. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add a Memory to recall something older and more powerful.)
recipes.Desc: A difficult tangle of lines.

recipes.Label: Craft: Savage Hymn
recipes.StartDescription: Raise the rhythms of the earth to a remembered music. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: whisper it to an Egg and hatch something that recalls an earlier era.)

recipes.Label: Craft: Awakened Feather
recipes.StartDescription: Bind a little wandering life to an abandoned feather. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: bind that life to an Egg, and hatch something that recalls an earlier era.)

recipes.Label: Craft: Awakened Feather
recipes.StartDescription: Align an abandoned feather to the currents of light. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: brush a Light with the feather, and see dawn-essence drip from the air.)

recipes.StartDescription: Whisper an ascension-cantrip to awaken an abandoned feather. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: whisper it to carved Wood, and enchant an instrument.)

recipes.Label: Craft: Bittersweet Certainty
recipes.StartDescription: Find a chilly insight in the labyrinths of memory. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: let it guide my hand when I dissect Remains, and I can render something darkly leathery, chillingly powerful.)
recipes.Desc: Hold on to it.

recipes.Label: Craft: Bittersweet Certainty

recipes.Label: Craft: Eigengrau

recipes.Label: Craft: Dearday Lens
recipes.StartDescription: Craft an optical device. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add Metal and create a substance with subtler properties.)
recipes.Desc: The Lens is asymmetrical - fragile - unstable. That's what gives it power.

recipes.Label: Craft: Old Wound
recipes.StartDescription: Explore an old wound to awaken the violent resonances within. (Or for a Scholar-level recipe: add a Memory and find an even bitterer dream.)
recipes.Desc: Move gingerly while the pain lasts.
